tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt / 67th qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.curYearHigh: Finished T26 at Mackenzie Tour Q-school, securing conditional status for the season
tourBios.carHigh: 2012: Missed the cut in his only two starts of the year.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won five team state championships at Houston Academy High School in Dothan, Ala...Was a 2004 and 2005 AJGA All-American...Was the medalist at the 2005 U.S. Junior Amateur Qualifier...Named 2007 second-team All-SEC. A year later, he was a Cleveland Golf All-America Scholar...Received Auburn's Cliff Hare Award, the highest honor available to an Auburn student-athlete.
tourBios.personal: Instructor is Jack Lumpkin in Sea Island, Ga...Enjoys being around family...Favorite course he played is Alotian Club and The Olympic Club...Never travels without his pillow...Favorite website is facebook.com...Favorite TV show is "The League," and his top movie is "The Shawshank Redemption." Favorite athlete is Cam Newton. Top vacation spot is anywhere with sand and water. Carries a peanut butter and banana sandwich in his golf bag...Not many people know he considers himself a "fantastic cook." Bucket list includes riding a hot air balloon and visiting Greece and Switzerland. Supports the Alabama Children's Hospital.

tourBios.curYrHigh: Finished T26 at Mackenzie Tour Q-school, securing conditional status for the season
tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Finished T39 at the Florida Qualifying Tournament, earning conditional status for the Mackenzie Tour's season.
tourBios.personal: Favorite course he's played is Olympic Club and hopes to play Pine Valley someday...Favorite athlete to watch is Rory McIlroy...Twitter handle is @Northcutt_Glenn.
